Articles: After getting out of the thick of the forest, the robot went to the river that flowed nearby.
Going further down the path, he saw a turn.
And there was a small dock around the corner.
But there was one trouble, broken trees blocked the passage
The robot decided to look what is stored in the boxes, maybe there is something useful there
The robot was able to open one of the drawers
Now it remains to see what lies there
Robot found an ax in a box
All that's left is to cut the fence
The robot went further and saw the bridge
The bridge is disassembled and could do with reassembly
The hardest part is over, you just need to nail the boards in the right places and the bridge will be ready!
The robot looked and realized that he could not swim across the river, because he was not protected from water
He went back to the bridge and started thinking about how to fix it
The bridge was repaired and the robot was able to walk over it
The robot went to the village
In the middle of the village, he saw a gate blocking the way further
The gate could not be opened and the robot went to look around for an item that can open the gate
The robot returned back to the village and moved towards the house
He walked a little
A little more later
And ended up inside
The robot went with the key to the gate
Passed through the village too
But his key didn't work
He went back to the center of the village
And went to the house opposite, hoping to find a suitable key
When he entered the house, he saw the chests
He got out and walked towards another robot that was in the middle of the village
And tried to turn it on
Taking the key, the robot went to the gate
The gate opened and the robot went uphill
